name: I (DON'T) HATE HENTAI PUZZLES
description:
Hi, guys. It’s the developer of the game. How is it going? Hah.
Let’s try to figure out what this game is and what one should expect of it, as it’s not easy to do it in just one sentence.

Roughly speaking, this story is about a person who decided to overcome his preferences in order to understand other people.
Doesn’t make a lot of sense, does it?

Then… It’s an art object that laughs at players, developers, game stores, games, all of us and many other things.
Still unclear?

It’s a HENTAI PUZZLE WITH A PLOT(!), plot-twists, humor, hot anime girls, small crack in the 4th wall and warning about what can happen to all of us, depicted in 3 acts.
